name: Brood (itch) (CLUNKK)
description:
Presented by Sophie Reid-Singer, in Collaboration with Matt Hsu's Obscure Orchestra.

Brood is a satirical videoludic experience in which the user traverses the digital womb of the Sphynx cat. 

The selective breeding of cats is used as a metaphor to contrast the fetishization of disability and how we as a society reflect on and value the disabled.

It is a shared experience, an encounter through the screen that suggests that the purpose cannot be decidedly found in reproduction.

Cats do not feel the social pressure of body politics, or the desire to dwell any deeper about their being – they are simply content having a nap.
